description: The 28-year-old suspect is accused of killing two people and attacking a synagogue in Halle in 2019.
title: Halle shooting: Trial begins for Germany synagogue attack suspect
title_page: Halle shooting: Trial begins for Germany synagogue attack suspect - BBC News
maintext: "It gives me a chance to talk about the bigger picture," she said. "It also gives me the chance to look the guy in the eye, if I can manage that emotionally, to look him in the eye and to kind of prove to him, but especially to me, 'You're the one who tried to kill me but I'm still here. You failed - and not only that I'm facing you in court.'"
